attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Keep Music Live and keep musicians in a job. There are to many productions in theatres both professional and amateur using recordings. 

Also, local bands around the UK playing in pubs are suffering because of regulations enforcing systems that cut the sound systems off when the music reaches a certain level.

So please help musicians carry on entertaining britain and beyond and Keep Live Music Live.
